description: RNA secondary structure analysis and probe design toolkit for functional RNA element identification

tools.description: Extract terminal motifs from RNA structures

tools.description: Design RNA probe library with barcodes

tools.description: Generate DNA templates with T7 promoter
tools.example_prompt: Use design_dna_templates with input @examples/data/test.fa.txt and barcodes @examples/data/barcode25mer_100000.txt

tools.name: run_forest_workflow
tools.example_prompt: Use run_forest_workflow with input @examples/data/test.fa.txt, barcodes @examples/data/barcode25mer_100000.txt, output directory results/workflow/

tools.name: submit_motif_extraction
tools.description: Background motif extraction for large datasets

tools.description: Background library design for large datasets

tools.name: submit_template_design
tools.description: Background template design for large datasets

tools.description: Background microarray design for large datasets

tools.name: submit_batch_motif_extraction
tools.description: Process multiple FASTA files in batch

tools.description: Run workflow on multiple files in batch

tools.example_prompt: Get job result for completed job

tools.description: List all jobs with optional status filter
